features: 8 Instrument Sounds & 10 Keys: Musical mat with 10 piano keys, 8 musical instrument sounds(Piano, Violin, Accordion, Trumpet, Vibraphone, Oboe, Guitar, Flute), 10 demos, one key one note, record & playback function. sanmersen piano mat can stimulate kids' hearing development, help identify colors, animals and notes.

Adjustable Volume: The volume can be adjusted on the music piano mat, to choose comfortable volume outdoor or indoor. Piano mat for toddler is easy to wipe clean, durable enough to withstand endless jumping. Open the floor piano mat switch and move your kids feet or hands to the beat.

3 x 1.5V AA Batteries Powered: Kids piano mat powered by 3 x 1.5V AA batteries (not included), just install the batteries then turn power switch is "ON" to play (Note that the ON/OFF on the power box is the "Power Switch"). Touch play mat can be played by hands or feet, inspire toddler's sport ability, and exercise the coordination of infant's hand and eye.

Soft Material & Foldable: Piano mat can be folded, easy to carry and use, a good musical toys for toddlers having a picnic or camping. Piano mat is made of soft non-woven fabric, it is safe and multifunctional musical toy for 1 2 3 year old girls boys.

Perfect Gifts For Kids: Touch play music mat is a great birthday, festivals and visiting gifts for 1 2 3 year old girls, friends and families. Funny and amazing toddler toys, great for developing kid's musical interest and improve hand-foot coordination skills.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: M SANMERSEN kids keyboard mat with 10 piano function keys and 8 musical instrument sounds, help kids to explore different sound combination and get lots of fun. Adopt intelligent electronic chips, piano mat will be to enter a state of energy saving automatically shuts down after 2 minutes if not use. Kids can touch music mat with hand or foot to make a sound, or dance with friends, which can exercise children's ability of coordination.

Power Switch Please install 3x 1.5V AA non-rechargeable batteries, then cover it or tighten the screws. And then turn on the power switch on the top of piano speaker first, NOT PRESS "on/off" button on the piano mat.

Features: -10 piano function keys. -8 musical instrument sounds: Piano, Violin, Accordion, Trumpet, Vibraphone, Oboe, Guitar, Flute. -10 demo songs and record & playback function, stimulate kids' hearing development. -Children can touch play dance mat by hands, also can use feet to kick up.

3 x 1.5V AA Batteries Powered -First install 3 x 1.5V AA batteries(not included), then turn on the power switch button. Adjust the volume and press the piano keys to make the sound. -Kids piano mat made of non-woven fabric material, toxic free and safe. Smooth surface of piano music mat will not harm to kid's soft skin. Inspire Kids Musical Talents -Sightseeing: The fresh color of the music carpet can simulate the children's vision. -Logic: Through the music and sound by the piano mat, develop the children's logic. -Hearing: The sweet music can simulate the children's hearing. -Sports skills: Through the lap and feet-step inspire the children's crawling and equip the children's sport ability. Foldable Piano Mat Foldable piano mat, easy to carry, you can take it wherever you go. Suitable Age: 3 years and up Item Size: 39.37 x 14.17 inches Package Size: 7.3 x 8.3 x 2.4 inches

Attention: 1). Please use the 3 x1.5V AA non-rechargeable batteries(It is recommended to use NEW batteries). 2). Please DO NOT use different types of batteries or mixed old and new batteries simultaneously. 3). DO NOT use this piano mat near the high temperature environment. 4). Please remove the batteries from musical piano mat if it not in use for a long time. PIANO MAT FAQ: 1. Not work? -- Make sure the battery is working properly: Please install 3 new 1.5V AA non-rechargeable batteries( Please DO NOT use different types of batteries or mixed old and new batteries simultaneously), then cover it and tighten the screws. -- Before using the "ON/OFF" button on the piano mat, please make sure that the "Power Switch" on the top of the piano power box is "ON". 2. No manual? -- Each package with detailed instruction, please read before use. 3. Slippery? -- Advise put it on the carpet or ceramic tile floor and wear non-slip sock. 4. Volume not work? -- Advise press "+" or "-" to choose the suitable volume, if still have problem, please ask us for help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Tots!
reviews.reviewText: Very cute toy. Gave to my granddaughter for her 1st birthday. She played with it right away. Lots of options on it. The best feature is the sound adjustment 😆

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what is shown
reviews.reviewText: This was surprisingly really good quality, has good sound and is durable. My daughter loves this and is her new favorite toy! Highly recommend and it was worth the price! Very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great idea, poor quality materials.
reviews.reviewText: The idea of this piano mat is great and both of my girls love it. This is our second one. On the first one the power switch stopped working. It was loose and when reattached just didn’t sit right likely due to damage from being dropped. On the second one, the inside wiring can bunch when my toddler crumples it and it has gotten stuck that way. I suggest sewing down the inside so it can’t shift. I would also add a non slip bottom for those of us with hard floors. It slides around very easily and can cause a child to fall as they step on it. The idea is great and it works well, but the quality of materials is poor and it does not hold up to long term use well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She likes it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice concept, horrible execution
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice gift for a baby 1 and under. The only issue is the buttons aren’t aligned with the mat. So some keys she stepped on wasn’t working properly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Wow great invention...makes allot of different sounds..worth the buy.

Love this for my kids. They love playing with it too. Only things is it automatically shuts off after a couple of minutes of none use. I thought it was great at first to save battery, but shuts off a little too fast. My daughter will walk away for a few minutes and come back and I have to shut it off and turn back on for her to use. If the timing was a little longer, would be perfect.
Nephew loves it but I thought it would be bigger. Colors and sounds are nice. As long as hes happy, Im happy with the purchase.
